p: In the present study we found that variation in protein and oil content of maize grain was significant ( p â‰¤ 0.01) across the cultivars. The P 3396 recorded highest protein and lowest oil content while cultivar P 3522 recorded higher oil content and lowest protein. The cultivar Rajkumar ranked in between for both protein as well as oil content. There are many reports stating such varietal differences in maize with respect to protein and oil content [ 52, 53].
